db.description:
- Keep cash in safe place at a maximum and minimum level to ensure the payment by cash on time. 
- Pay all invoices to be paid by cash 
- Do accounting operations relative to cash handling 
- Submit and report to Line Manager on weekly basic 
- Other tasks assigned by Line Manager
db.requirement:
- Communicating in English
- Work shifts (07:00 am – 03:00 pm; or 02:30 pm – 10:30 pm), 1 day off/ week
- Place of working: No 01 - Street No.104-BTT, Quarter 3, Binh Trung Tay Ward, Dist. 2, HCMC, VN
